Title: Mummified Ape
Description:
Adds the mummified ape as a random encounter to the hills biome. An unfortunate albino ape pilgrim did not survive the journey to Oboroqoru yet their mortal remains may yield some aid to a savvy adventurer.
Use the wish revealsecret:$CrabEmperor_ApeMummy_mummifiedApe to find the location of it under the oddities tab.
